[00:00.00]Baltimore (04-27-27) - Clarence Williams
[00:57.93]As the dance cover black black bottom called Baltimore
[01:02.34]Oh baby that's dance has come
[01:04.70]Oh rhythm back half
[01:06.14]
[01:06.96]And when my bent of swing you talk swan like a rectangle
[01:11.68]Then you begin stepping out
[01:13.10]
[01:13.75]Your weapons shout
[01:15.04]Hey hey
[01:16.97]Now first keep count the peter name
[01:19.48]You double leaf
[01:20.24]
[01:20.93]Then repeat
[01:22.03]Then your feet
[01:23.41]Right over the floor
[01:26.35]Now that the dance dance cover black black bottom never hit before
[01:29.75]No fear
[01:31.44]Do that sister
[01:32.80]Call Baltimore
[01:35.20]
[02:13.89]Call him black black bottom called Baltimore
[02:17.46]Oh baby that's dance has come
[02:19.12]
[02:19.86]Oh rhythm back half
[02:22.29]And when my bent of swing you talk swan like a rectangle
[02:26.95]Then you begin stepping out
[02:28.38]
[02:28.92]Your weapons shout
[02:29.57]
[02:30.15]Hey hey
[02:32.14]Now first keep count the peter name
[02:34.33]You double leaf
[02:35.37]
[02:35.96]Then repeat
[02:37.04]Then your feet
[02:38.05]
[02:38.59]Right over the floor
[02:41.32]Aw that the dance dance cover black black bottom never hit before
[02:45.06]No fear
data.trans:
[ti:Baltimore (04-27-27)]
[ar:Clarence Williams]
[al:Complete Jazz Series 1927]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:57.93]随着舞蹈覆盖黑人黑人同胞就像巴尔的摩
[01:02.34]宝贝这就是舞蹈
[01:04.70]节奏慢了一半
[01:06.14]
[01:06.96]当我摇摆翘臀时你说着甜言蜜语
[01:11.68]然后你开始走出家门
[01:13.10]
[01:13.75]你的武器
[01:15.04]//
[01:16.97]现在首先要记住彼得的名字
[01:19.48]你让我神魂颠倒
[01:20.24]
[01:20.93]然后重复
[01:22.03]你的双脚
[01:23.41]就在地板上
[01:26.35]现在热舞热舞翻唱以前从未有过的感觉
[01:29.75]无所畏惧
[01:31.44]做那个姐姐
[01:32.80]给巴尔的摩打电话
[01:35.20]
[02:13.89]就叫他黑人同胞就叫Baltimore
[02:17.46]宝贝这就是舞蹈
[02:19.12]
[02:19.86]节奏慢了一半
[02:22.29]当我摇摆翘臀时你说着甜言蜜语
[02:26.95]然后你开始走出家门
[02:28.38]
[02:28.92]你的武器
[02:29.57]
[02:30.15]//
[02:32.14]现在首先要记住彼得的名字
[02:34.33]你让我神魂颠倒
[02:35.37]
[02:35.96]然后重复
[02:37.04]你的双脚
[02:38.05]
[02:38.59]就在地板上
[02:41.32]尽情热舞让我欲罢不能
[02:45.06]无所畏惧
